title: Looking for an 1887 St. Louis Browns Souvenir Silk Sheet with Charles Comiskey

posts.post_title: Looking for an 1887 St. Louis Browns Souvenir Silk Sheet with Charles Comiskey
posts.post_content:
I am looking for this 1887 St. Louis Browns silk.  Please contact me at [url]tp7161@yahoo.com[/url] if you have one for sale or trade.  I may have trade items on your wantlist.
